achievements.name: Salt for My Foes, and Water for Me
achievements.desc: Obtain at least three healing orbs fired from the "water droplets" during the Hydro Hypostasis fight.

achievements.name: The Fraught Return
achievements.desc: Stop the Hydro Hypostasis from reviving itself without destroying any of the "water droplets" by placing obstacles or repelling them.

achievements.name: Moment of Destruction
achievements.desc: Defeat Signora without using any Crimson Lotus Moths.

achievements.name: Electric Escape
achievements.desc: Defeat a Thunder Manifestation without being hit by its homing thunder cage attack.

achievements.name: Radio Silence
achievements.desc: Get locked on by the Thunder Manifestation before you can attack it.

achievements.name: Swimming Prohibited
achievements.desc: Defeat the Bathysmal Vishap Herd without allowing them to dive into the water.

achievements.name: Death Proof
achievements.desc: Dodge one entire round of the Baleful Vajra's destructive waves during one battle with Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto.

achievements.name: Ouroboros
achievements.desc: Destroy Oozing Concretions to paralyze the Ruin Serpent while it is gathering energy.
